content: of the last chain 5 chain 3 and join with a half_double_crochet 10 chain 3 single_crochet in chain space chain 5 skip 1dc 4dc 2dc chain 2 2dc in chain space 4 double_crochet chain 5 single_crochet in chain space 8 double_crochet in chain space single_crochet in chain space chain 5 repeat along the way to join stop at the last 8dc and join in the single_crochet with a slip_stitch 11 chain 3 single_crochet in chain space chain 5 skip 2 double_crochet 4 double_crochet 2dc chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain space 4 double_crochet chain 5 single_crochet in chain space 1dc chain 1 x 7 1 double_crochet repeat along the way to join stop at the 7th 1dc chain 1 and slip_stitch to the next single_crochet 12 chain 3 single_crochet in chain space chain 5 skip 2 double_crochet decrease x 2 2dc chain 2 2dc in chain space decrease x 2 chain 5 single_crochet in chain space chain 3 dc3tog in chain space chain 3 x 7 single_crochet in chain space repeat along the way join with a slip_stitch at the next single_crochet -//- main piece finished optional 13 chain 8 skip chain space single_crochet chain 8 single_crochet in the next chain space chain 8 skip 2 double_crochet skip 1 decrease single_crochet chain 8 single_crochet in the next single_crochet chain 8 skip chain space skip dc3tog single_crochet in chain space chain 8 skip dc3tog skip chain space skip dc3tog single_crochet in chain space x 2 chain 8 single_crochet in the next single_crochet repeat along the way join with a slip_stitch 14 4 single_crochet picot 4 single_crochet in chain space repeat along the way join with slip_stitch
